name: Waste of Space Plus
description:
A collection of small nihilistic interactive projects.

A followup/sequel to an animated short film I made back in 2014 (Watch it here.) Waste of Space Plus was made over a semester as part of my Alternative/Art Games course @ RMIT and is a compilation of a series of smaller projects I made during the course. 

Controls: 

Left mouse button.

Play Time:

~5 minutes.
